name: resize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change the size of an image on a computer: With simple editing tools you can resize and rotate images and add shapes, lines, and text. The site asks you to resize your browser and change your font and colour settings. The photos are grainy -- they look like they've been resized from old mobile phone photos.
to make something, especially a ring, larger or smaller: I highly recommend this place; they've resized my wedding ring for free twice. When we purchased my engagement ring, it had to be resized from a 7.5 to a 6.
